title: Chamberlain vs Hitler
creator_credit: Wolper Productions, David L. Wolper and Alan Landsburg
brief_description: Shows the meeting between Chamberlain and Hitler and the compromises in philosophy thatwere made by each other in the drafting of the Munich Pact. Suitable for secondary school level.
